Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
GameControl Class - GameControl This is a basic controler to handle two way comunication with the model.
GameDriver Class - GameDriver This is the main class it s1imply sets up the model, view and controler & menu, places the view in a frame and then opens them in a thread safe manner.
GameMenu Class - GameMenu This is the menu bar including options (setup players and new game), and help
GameModel Class - GameModel The model that holds the information for the curent game aswell as the logic behind the game.
GameView Class - GameView The main view for the game holds a header, 9 squares, an info box and two player squares
Header Class - Header A simple display to show either hollywood squares or a message congratulating the current winner
InfoBox Class - InfoBox This is the dialog area at the bottom of the game play area where questions/answers and buttons to interact with the player are presented (agree, disagree, play again...) Everything here other than the buttons are painted with java 2D buttons are playced in a layout and made to look nice with images aswell as setting the border to an empty border and setting the content area to not filled.
Move Class - Move This just stores the current move, it's seperated into a class so that functionality can be added to store wining squares during a check in the model and it can be animated onto the gui
Player Class - Player The player objects for the model to store the pertinent data
PlayerSquare Class - PlayerSquare GUI for the players
Question Class - Question Object to store a question
Square Class - Square A component to display celeberty squares for the grid
 

Enum Summary
State Enum - State An enum to store a state blank, x or o.
